relproducts.title: Rimini Miami Yellow - Roller Blind
relproducts.description: Well, the name says it all. The rimini's miami yellow is bright, funky, and summery. Due to its lightweight but sturdy fabric, it has a surprising level of opaqueness, despite its light colour. Not that you'll notice, with the colour of sunshine in your window. This is the ideal hue for creating a sunny, cheery kitchen, or a fun, energetic home office. Pair with creams and pretty florals for some country chic, or with sky blue shades for a fun, summery feel.

Our roller blinds are great for privacy and light control, and come with sleek white components.

Plus, it has double sided print that can be admired from outside too. This blind is made from blackout fabric to prevent unwanted light travelling into your room and its flame retardant for safety.

relproducts.title: Infusion Asc Muted Gold Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: Infusion asc muted gold perfect fit pleated blind. Part of their infusion asc range, where advanced solar control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter.

relproducts.title: Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Infusion Asc Muted Gold
relproducts.description: Infusion asc perfect fit pleated blinds are manufactured from high quality uk made fabrics. The advanced solar coating on the reverse of the fabric significantly reduces heat and glare entering your room, making them ideal for south facing windows and conservatories. Perfect fit pleated blind infusion asc muted gold available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

relproducts.title: Galaxy Asc Blackout Ecru Perfect Fit
relproducts.description: Part of their galaxy blackout range, where advanced solar control (asc) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The asc refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the summer and retaining heat in the winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.
